resources.string:

Take a look at ROM Extra Settings for fine tuning your experience.
Want to keep your for phone up to date in future also? Please donate few bucks for server costs.
Enjoy!

When changing internet detection mode, system reboot is required. Reboot now?
This operation will reboot to recovery and install root access files. Do you want to continue?
This operation will reboot to recovery and uninstall root access. Do you want to continue?
